content.html: Every single time I come back from a conference my brain is like “gotta learn this this this this and this” Takes me a few hours to process everything and decide what I want to actually look into and what I want to bench forever.
content.value:
Every single time I come back from a conference my brain is like “gotta learn this this this this and this”

Takes me a few hours to process everything and decide what I want to actually look into and what I want to bench forever.
